Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to placing greater regulations and restraints on the creation of driveway curb cuts; ending self-certification of curb cuts by lot owners; and providing local community board notification.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Placing greater regulations and restraints on the creation of driveway curb cuts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to demarcations at mid-block pedestrian ramps on curbs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Improving demarcations and signage at all pedestrian crosswalks.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the illegally created curb cuts to be restored, making those who maintain illegally created curb cuts liable for penalties, requiring the department of transportation to restore illegally created curb cuts and providing for the reimbursement to the department for the cost for such work.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the illegally created curb cuts to be restored, making those who maintain illegally created curb cuts liable for penalties.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the review of curb cuts.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Placing greater regulations and restraints on the creation of driveway curb cuts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to demarcations at mid-block pedestrian ramps on curbs.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the illegally created curb cuts to be restored, making those who maintain illegally created curb cuts liable for penalties.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the review of curb cuts.
